channel.title: Making the Most Out of Life
channel.description: Making the Most Out of Life

item.title: about chris walker
item.description:
about chris walker

For each of the next 30 days you are going to learn something very special. Each day the focus changes. We move from inspiration to health, to environment, to self and values, to vision, purpose and self talk. In the learning each day, you get to spend as little as ten minutes or up to an hour if you have the time.

item.title: Sarah Kay: If I should have a daughter ...
item.description:
Sarah Kay: If I should have a daughter ...

"If I should have a daughter, instead of Mom, she's gonna call me Point B ... " began spoken word poet Sarah Kay, in a talk that inspired two standing ovations at TED2011. She tells the story of her metamorphosis -- from a wide-eyed teenager soaking in verse at New York's Bowery Poetry Club to a teacher connecting kids with the power of self-expression through Project V.O.I.C.E.

item.title: What's Happening In Your Life Today?
item.description:
What's Happening In Your Life Today?

If you listen to the pundits, you'll be going in the direction of the masses, always a bad omen for someone who wants a degree of self respect and also, wants to function with a cool head. I call this the helicopter mindset. Not too high to be irrelevant, not too low to be dopey. Just the right height to see with both eyes, and your heart, what's really going on?
